title: Constant Attempting to Reconnect
body: My internet is fine, everything looks good, but everytime I'm in a game it always boots me. 1 min dc, 2 min no lag, rinse and repeat.

replies.body: Even if your internet is working, that doesn't necessarily mean you're able to get a perfect signal with our servers for a variety of reasons. The internet can be a fickle mistress sometimes. Usually, you can update your port forward and DNS settings to make sure your network is routing your connection in the best way, so check out those two steps in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and test them in a custom game first before hopping back into matchmade games.

rito it's been happeneing ever since last patch for people from different countries and on different server and all you do is link that connection guide even though nothing changed with our PCs/ internet
